universe_note: Ranked only the provided packets. Liquidity gate applied: avg_dollar_volume_20d >= 50,000,000 and price >= 2. Exclusion checks for 'price up >15% last 5 trading days' and 'earnings >10 calendar days out' could not be validated from packets (no 5-day return series; earnings dates mostly Unknown). Options and social sentiment data not provided in packets; factor score caps applied per rules.

top5.name: Broadcom Inc.

target.bear_case_note: Breakdown back below short-term moving averages (MA10/MA20) with momentum cooling (RSI rolling over) would invalidate the near-term continuation thesis.

primary_catalyst.title: Product / CES newsflow: new Wi‑Fi products launch
primary_catalyst.why_it_matters: Fresh product announcements can extend AI/enterprise networking narrative and drive incremental estimate revisions and momentum continuation over the next week.

sources.title: Broadcom Inc. (AVGO) Launches new Wi-Fi Products at CES 2026
5 U.S. chip stocks to buy in 2026: Bernstein

risk_factors: Macro/semis beta: chip complex can gap on CPI/macro headlines; realized vol is elevated.
Catalyst is not a single binary dated event (no confirmed earnings date in packet); follow-through may fade if CES/product news is already priced.

top5.name: Transocean Ltd.

target.bear_case_note: If the stock loses the short-term trend (back below MA20/MA50) or oil/offshore drillers sell off broadly, the contract-news momentum setup weakens.

primary_catalyst.title: Contract awards / backlog additions (Brazil & Norway) reported
primary_catalyst.why_it_matters: Backlog additions can improve near-term narrative on utilization/cash flow and trigger follow-through buying in high-beta offshore drillers.

sources.title: Transocean's New Deals in Brazil & Norway Add $168M to Firm Backlog
Transocean secures Mykonos contract, Enabler extension worth $168m backlog

risk_factors: Energy/offshore drilling is highly correlated to crude price and macro risk; gaps can occur on OPEC/geopolitics.
Low-priced equity can exhibit higher realized volatility and wider spreads; risk of sharp reversals.

top5.name: Axsome Therapeutics, Inc.

target.bear_case_note: Biotech momentum can unwind quickly; a failure to hold recent highs/MA20 after the FDA-related pop would invalidate the continuation setup.

primary_catalyst.title: FDA-related milestones (priority review / 'dual FDA boosts' newsflow)
primary_catalyst.why_it_matters: Regulatory milestone headlines can drive multi-day momentum in biotech as investors reprice probability-weighted revenue and near-term optionality.

sources.title: Why Axsome Therapeutics (AXSM) Is Up 17.5% After Dual FDA Boosts For AXS-05 And AXS-12 – And What's Next
AXSM Up on FDA Priority Review to AXS-05 sNDA in Alzheimer's Agitation

risk_factors: Binary/regulatory headline risk typical for biotech; reversals can be sharp if expectations get ahead of facts.
Potential exclusion risk: headline indicates a large recent move; without 5-day return data, cannot confirm it is not already >15% in last 5 trading days.
